I purchased one of these to try and ended up getting it in multiple colors. I live in Florida where it is very hot and humid and this is a great go to tank top for every day wear. It is very roomy and comfortable, and the arm holes are spacious enough to where you don’t feel constricted. I have washed it in the washing machine multiple times and it still looks very new without any piling of the fabric whatsoever. It does not feel like it’s 100% cotton and has some synthetic fabric feeling to it, but it is minimal. I normally only wear 100% cotton or linen but this one passed my test.
